import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; // Import OnInit import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-category-highscore-page', templateUrl: './category-highscore-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./category-highscore-page.component.css'] }) export class CategoryHighscorePageComponent implements OnInit { // Implement OnInit highscore!: Array; constructor(private http: HttpClient, private router: Router) { } ngOnInit() { const url = 'http://localhost:5002/spiele'; this.http.get>(url).subscribe((response) => { // Specify the type of the response as Array this.highscore = response; }); } }
